crashTests.description: Good protection for all critical body areas

adultOccupant.details: The passenger compartment remained stable in the frontal offset test. Dummy readings indicated good protection of the knees and femurs of both the driver and passenger.

childOccupant.details: In the frontal offset test, protection of all critical body areas was good for both the 6 and 10 year dummies.

vulnerableRoadUsers.details: The bonnet provided good or adequate protection over most of its surface. The AEB system performed well in tests of pedestrian scenarios.

safetyAssist.details: The vehicle is equipped with an advanced AEB system that can detect pedestrians and cyclists. Lane support system works effectively.

additionalNotes: This vehicle demonstrates excellent overall safety performance with strong scores across all categories.
